title: Horror as man is tied up and sexually assaulted in his own home by a stranger
text:
Police are investigating after a man was allegedly tied up and sexually assaulted in his own home by a stranger.

The 33-year-old victim was taken to hospital after police were called to the house near Armidale in New South Wales on Sunday.

A 37-year-old South Australian man was later arrested at a home in Uralla and police believe he did not know his victim.

A 33-year-old man was tied up and sexually assaulted by a stranger in his house near Armidale, New South Wales (file image)

The victim is recovering in hospital and is in a stable condition.

The 37-year-old was charged with five counts of aggravated sexual assault – deprive liberty, and aggravated sexual assault – inflict actual bodily harm on victim.

He was refused bail and will appear in Armidale Local Court on Monday.
description: The 33-year-old victim was taken to hospital after police were called to the house near Armidale in New South Wales on Sunday.
authors: Eliza Mcphee For Daily Mail Australia
